special_text:
[+1]: You may create a Pacifism Aura enchantment token. [i](It’s an Aura that prevents the creature from attacking or blocking.)[/i]
[0]: Create Yaromir, a legendary 0/0 white Fox creature token with “This creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control.”
[-7]: Creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of enchantments you control.
